Macros
HWA_RAM_TYPE
HWA Driver External Data Structures » HWA_MACROS

Macros that define values for the ramType argument of HWA_configRam() function. More...

Macros

#define HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM   ((uint8_t)0U)
 
#define HWA_RAM_TYPE_INTERNAL_RAM   ((uint8_t)1U)
 

Detailed Description

Macros that define values for the ramType argument of HWA_configRam() function.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define HWA_RAM_TYPE_INTERNAL_RAM   ((uint8_t)1U)

Internal RAM for Vector Multiplication mode

#define HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM   ((uint8_t)0U)

WINDOW RAM for windowing operation
